hero.title: Customer Reviews
hero.subtitle: Real experiences from people who trust QiSol

testimonials.name: Mrs. Somying Jaidee
testimonials.content: Used QiSol for 3 months, surgical scars faded significantly. Skin became noticeably smoother. Thank you PEMF technology for real skin restoration.

testimonials.name: Mr. Witthaya Chaichana
testimonials.content: Had knee pain for a long time. After using QiSol for just 2 weeks, symptoms improved a lot. Walking is much easier now. No longer need pain medication.

testimonials.name: Mrs. Pimjai Suayngam
testimonials.content: Facial skin is smooth and soft. Pores are tighter. Use before bed every day. Wake up with fresh, glowing skin. No more expensive creams needed.

testimonials.name: Mr. Prasit Khaengraeng
testimonials.content: Have diabetes, leg wound was healing slowly. Used QiSol and it helped a lot. Wound healed much faster than before. Even my doctor was surprised.

testimonials.name: Mrs. Nanthana Suksawat
testimonials.content: Back pain from sitting at work. Use QiSol every day, symptoms improved greatly. Sleep better. No more pain when waking up.

testimonials.name: Mrs. Arunee Meesuk
testimonials.content: After childbirth, skin was sagging. Used QiSol for 1 month, skin visibly tightened. Stretch marks faded. Feel much more confident.
